triellipt — Examples

This document provides a number of examples on how to use the triellipt package.

Refer to the following sections for specific examples:

  • Zernike modes — Reprodicuing the Zernike polynomials (a).
  • Boundary layer — Solving the 1D boundary layer problem (b).
  • Pulsing mesh — Testing refinement and coarseing steps.

(a) This example illustrates the use of the FEM unit with a basic boundary partition.

(b) This example demonstrates how to use automatic boundary partitioning (DtN unit).
